title: Hired Gun Graves gun bugged
body: Hired Gun Graves currently(and has for awhile) been bugged with the gun, you can see it on almost any new photo of him from the side The guns barrel floats completely away from the guns base itself. As someone who mained Graves for awhile, this bugs the hell out of me. I hope it gets fixed

replies.body: Thanks for the report! Lemme take a look and see what's going on!
Thank you for acknowledging it! Not gamebreaking by anyway but definitely odd to look at
